verses.niv: 19 As water reflects a face, so a man's heart reflects the man.
verses.kjv: 19 As in water face answereth to face, so the heart of man to man.
verses.esv:
19   As in water face reflects face,
    so the heart of man reflects the man.

verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it?
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it?
verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?

verses.niv: 7 But the LORD said to Samuel, "Do not consider his appearance or his height, for I have rejected him. The LORD does not look at the things man looks at. Man looks at the outward appearance, but the LORD looks at the heart."
verses.kjv: 7 But the LORD said unto Samuel, Look not on his countenance, or on the height of his stature; because I have refused him: for the LORD seeth not as man seeth; for man looketh on the outward appearance, but the LORD looketh on the heart.
verses.esv: 7 But the LORD said to Samuel, “Do not look on his appearance or on the height of his stature, because I have rejected him. For the LORD sees not as man sees: man looks on the outward appearance, but the LORD looks on the heart.”

verses.niv: 21 For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.
verses.kjv: 21 For where your treasure is, there will your heart be also.
verses.esv: 21 For where your treasure is, there your heart will be also.

verses.niv: 23 Above all else, guard your heart, for it is the wellspring of life.
verses.kjv: 23 Keep thy heart with all diligence; for out of it are the issues of life.
verses.esv:
23   Keep your heart with all vigilance,
    for from it flow the springs of life.

verses.niv: 13 A happy heart makes the face cheerful, but heartache crushes the spirit.
verses.kjv: 13 A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
verses.esv:
13   A glad heart makes a cheerful face,
    but by sorrow of heart the spirit is crushed.

verses.niv: 38 Whoever believes in me, as the Scripture has said, streams of living water will flow from within him."
verses.kjv: 38 He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
verses.esv: 38 Whoever believes in me, as the Scripture has said, ‘Out of his heart will flow rivers of living water.’”

verses.niv: 37 Jesus replied: "'Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.'
verses.kjv: 37 Jesus said unto him, Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind.
verses.esv: 37 And he said to him, “You shall love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your mind.

verses.niv: 34 You brood of vipers, how can you who are evil say anything good? For out of the overflow of the heart the mouth speaks.
verses.kjv: 34 O generation of vipers, how can ye, being evil, speak good things? for out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaketh.
verses.esv: 34 You brood of vipers! How can you speak good, when you are evil? For out of the abundance of the heart the mouth speaks.

verses.niv: 10 Create in me a pure heart, O God, and renew a steadfast spirit within me.
verses.kjv: 10 Create in me a clean heart, O God; and renew a right spirit within me.
verses.esv:
10   Create in me a clean heart, O God,
    and renew a right spirit within me.

verses.niv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things and beyond cure. Who can understand it? 10 "I the LORD search the heart and examine the mind, to reward a man according to his conduct, according to what his deeds deserve."
verses.kjv: 9 The heart is deceitful above all things, and desperately wicked: who can know it? 10 I the LORD search the heart, I try the reins, even to give every man according to his ways, and according to the fruit of his doings.
verses.esv:
9   The heart is deceitful above all things,
    and desperately sick;
    who can understand it?
10   “I the LORD search the heart
    and test the mind,
  to give every man according to his ways,
    according to the fruit of his deeds.”

verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight. 7 Do not be wise in your own eyes; fear the LORD and shun evil.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths. 7 Be not wise in thine own eyes: fear the LORD, and depart from evil.
verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
7   Be not wise in your own eyes;
    fear the LORD, and turn away from evil.

verses.niv: 19 Do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit, who is in you, whom you have received from God? You are not your own; 20 you were bought at a price. Therefore honor God with your body.
verses.kjv: 19 What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own? 20 For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God’s.
verses.esv: 19 Or do you not know that your body is a temple of the Holy Spirit within you, whom you have from God? You are not your own, 20 for you were bought with a price. So glorify God in your body.

verses.niv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give you. I do not give to you as the world gives. Do not let your hearts be troubled and do not be afraid.
verses.kjv: 27 Peace I leave with you, my peace I give unto you: not as the world giveth, give I unto you. Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
verses.esv: 27 Peace I leave with you; my peace I give to you. Not as the world gives do I give to you. Let not your hearts be troubled, neither let them be afraid.

verses.niv: 19 I will give them an undivided heart and put a new spirit in them; I will remove from them their heart of stone and give them a heart of flesh.
verses.kjv: 19 And I will give them one heart, and I will put a new spirit within you; and I will take the stony heart out of their flesh, and will give them an heart of flesh:
verses.esv: 19 And I will give them one heart, and a new spirit I will put within them. I will remove the heart of stone from their flesh and give them a heart of flesh,

verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.

verses.niv: 7 And the peace of God, which transcends all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.
verses.kjv: 7 And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your hearts and minds through Christ Jesus.
verses.esv: 7 And the peace of God, which surpasses all understanding, will guard your hearts and your minds in Christ Jesus.

verses.niv: 8 Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
verses.kjv: 8 Blessed are the pure in heart: for they shall see God.
verses.esv: 8 “Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God.

verses.niv: 4 Delight yourself in the LORD and he will give you the desires of your heart.
verses.kjv: 4 Delight thyself also in the LORD; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.esv:
4   Delight yourself in the LORD,
    and he will give you the desires of your heart.

verses.niv: 45 The good man brings good things out of the good stored up in his heart, and the evil man brings evil things out of the evil stored up in his heart. For out of the overflow of his heart his mouth speaks.
verses.kjv: 45 A good man out of the good treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is good; and an evil man out of the evil treasure of his heart bringeth forth that which is evil: for of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaketh.
verses.esv: 45 The good person out of the good treasure of his heart produces good, and the evil person out of his evil treasure produces evil, for out of the abundance of the heart his mouth speaks.

verses.niv: 19 For out of the heart come evil thoughts, murder, adultery, sexual immorality, theft, false testimony, slander.
verses.kjv: 19 For out of the heart proceed evil thoughts, murders, adulteries, fornications, thefts, false witness, blasphemies:
verses.esv: 19 For out of the heart come evil thoughts, murder, adultery, sexual immorality, theft, false witness, slander.

verses.niv: 2 All a man's ways seem right to him, but the LORD weighs the heart.
verses.kjv: 2 Every way of a man is right in his own eyes: but the LORD pondereth the hearts.
verses.esv:
2   Every way of a man is right in his own eyes,
    but the LORD weighs the heart.

verses.niv: 22 A cheerful heart is good medicine, but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.
verses.kjv: 22 A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
verses.esv:
22   A joyful heart is good medicine,
    but a crushed spirit dries up the bones.

verses.niv: 18 The LORD is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
verses.kjv: 18 The LORD is nigh unto them that are of a broken heart; and saveth such as be of a contrite spirit.
verses.esv:
18   The LORD is near to the brokenhearted
    and saves the crushed in spirit.

verses.niv: 14 May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be pleasing in your sight, O Lord, my Rock and my Redeemer.
verses.kjv: 14 Let the words of my mouth, and the meditation of my heart, be acceptable in thy sight, O LORD, my strength, and my redeemer.
verses.esv:
14   Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart
    be acceptable in your sight,
    O LORD, my rock and my redeemer.
